page.title: 18LIFE STYLES
page.content: IN THE{BRUNTON}AREA,{LIFE STYLES}ARE, TO SOME EXTENT,CONDITIONED BY REMOTENESS FROM A TOWN. PEOPLE TEND TO BE HOME_LOVING,AND TO HAVE INTERESTS WHICH ARE COUNTRY BASED.THE{TELEVISION PLAYS NO SMALL PART IN PEOPLE'S LIVES, AND OTHER HOME_BASED HOBBIES AND INTERESTS INCLUDE{CROOK MAKING, {KNITTING}AND{CROCHETING. }PEOPLE VISIT EACH OTHER AND GO TO LOCAL{CONCERTS OR OTHER ENTERTAINMENTS INFREQUENTLY. ALTHOUGH MANY PEOPLE WORK AWAY FROM THE AREA, ON THEIR RETURN, THEIR LIVES ASSUME THE EVEN TENOR OF COUNTRY WAYS AGAIN.MANY OF THEM LIVE IN THIS AREA BY CHOICE. THEY FEEL THAT THEIR CHILDREN HAVE A FREER LIFE THAN THEY WOULD IN AN{URBAN}AREA.
